mapper.select: select t3.id, t3.name, t3.path, t3.component, t3.title, t3.type, t3.icon, t3.parent_id, t3.`order`, t3.creator, t3.create_time, t3.updator, t3.update_time, t3.status from (select distinct t1.resource_id from sys_rel_role_resource t1 left join sys_rel_user_role t2 on t1.role_id = t2.role_id where t2.user_id = #{userId}) t left join sys_resource t3 on t.resource_id = t3.id
